title: Microphone not working
content:
Microphone stopped working after latest update. Google assistant can't hear. Callers can't hear and no apps can hear. I typically only use voice for calling or assistant so I don't know what else could cause this.  I've tried.

Restarting
Reset Bluetooth and wifi
Factory Reset

Nothing is working. Phone is only 6mo old. No drops. No damages. NOTHING. just stopped out of the blue. Very frustrating.
